title: BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop for Hard Floors and Area Rugs, Black, 2554A
descriptions:
### BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop for Hard Floors and Area Rugs, Black, 2554A

#### Product Overview
The BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max is the ultimate all-in-one cleaning solution for your home, combining a powerful vacuum and a deep-cleaning mop in one sleek, cordless design. Perfect for tile, sealed wood floors, laminate, linoleum, rubber floor mats, pressed wood floors, and area rugs, this versatile cleaner ensures that every surface in your home is spotless and protected. With its advanced 36V Lithium-Ion battery, the CrossWave Cordless Max delivers up to 30 minutes of continuous cleaning, making it ideal for tackling even the largest rooms.

#### Key Features
- **Rotating Brush System**: The rotating brush effectively loosens and lifts dirt, grime, and pet hair from your floors.
- **10.5-Inch Cleaning Path Width**: Covers a wide area with each pass, making cleaning faster and more efficient.
- **Swivel Head**: The swivel head allows for easy maneuvering around furniture and in tight spaces.
- **Carry Handle**: The ergonomic carry handle makes it easy to transport the cleaner from room to room.
- **Two-Tank Technology**: Separate clean water tank (28 oz) and dirt tank (18.6 oz) ensure that your floors are always cleaned with fresh water and that dirty water is kept separate.
- **Improved Edge Cleaning**: Clean along baseboards and in corners with ease.
- **WiFi Connected**: Compatible with BISSELL Connect, allowing you to control and monitor your cleaning from your smartphone.
- **Self-Cleaning Cycle**: The self-cleaning cycle makes maintenance quick and easy.
- **Multi-Surface Cleaning**: Suitable for use on a variety of hard surfaces, including tile, sealed wood floors, laminate, linoleum, rubber floor mats, pressed wood floors, and area rugs.
- **Included Accessories**:
  - 2 Multi-Surface Trial Formulas
  - 2 Hard Floor Sanitize Trial Formulas
  - 2 Multi-Surface Brush Rolls

#### Battery and Performance
- **Battery Type**: 36V Lithium-Ion
- **Battery Life**: Up to 30 minutes of continuous cleaning
- **Cordless Design**: Freedom to clean without the hassle of cords

#### Environmental and Charitable Impact
- **Supports the BISSELL Pet Foundation**: A portion of the proceeds from the sale of this product goes to support the BISSELL Pet Foundation, helping to save homeless pets and promote adoption.

#### Why Choose the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max?
- **Efficiency**: Clean and sanitize your floors in one pass, saving you time and effort.
- **Versatility**: Suitable for a wide range of surfaces, making it a versatile addition to your cleaning arsenal.
- **Ease of Use**: The cordless design, swivel head, and carry handle make it easy to use and store.
- **Advanced Technology**: WiFi connectivity and self-cleaning features ensure that your cleaning experience is as modern and convenient as possible.

#### Product Specifications
- **Brand**: BISSELL
- **Model Number**: 2554A
- **Color**: Black
- **Functions**: Vacuum, Wash
- **Surface Compatibility**: Tile, Sealed wood floors, Laminate, Linoleum, Rubber floor mats, Pressed wood floors, Area rugs
- **Battery Type**: 36V Lithium-Ion
- **Battery Life**: Up to 30 minutes
- **Cordless**: Yes
- **Brush System**: Rotating
- **Cleaning Path Width**: 10.5 inches
- **Swivel Head**: Yes
- **Carry Handle**: Yes
- **Tank Capacities**:
  - Clean Water Tank: 28 oz
  - Dirt Tank: 18.6 oz
- **WiFi Connected**: Yes
- **App Compatibility**: BISSELL Connect
- **Self-Cleaning Cycle**: Yes
- **Edge Cleaning**: Improved
- **Two-Tank Technology**: Yes
- **Charitable Support**: BISSELL Pet Foundation

#### Customer Reviews
- "This cleaner is a game-changer! It's so easy to use and my floors have never been cleaner."
- "The BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max is a must-have for pet owners. It picks up everything, even the toughest pet hair."
- "I love the WiFi connectivity feature. It's so convenient to control and monitor my cleaning from my phone."

#### Conclusion
The BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop is the perfect addition to any home. Its advanced features, versatile cleaning capabilities, and user-friendly design make it an excellent choice for maintaining a clean and healthy living environment. Plus, by supporting the BISSELL Pet Foundation, you can feel good about your purchase knowing that you're helping to make a difference in the lives of homeless pets.

**Order yours today and experience the convenience and power of the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max!**
